headline: Public Storage Leadership Shift And PS4.0 Put Margin Story To Test
summary: Public Storage (NYSE:PSA) is planning a CEO transition, with H. Thomas Boyle set to succeed Joseph D. Russell, Jr. The company is implementing several executive appointments and changes in board leadership. Public Storage is relocating its corporate headquarters from California to Texas. The company has introduced its PS4.0 initiative, focused on growth and operational efficiency. Public Storage, a large self storage REIT, operates at the intersection of real estate, consumer storage needs,...
